name: IMCU FInancial Literacry Game
description:
What is this Game?

This is a financial literacy card game made for Indiana Members Credit Union.  A digital board game about teaching children, teenagers, and adults how to make good and bad financial decisions. 

How to Play:

You (The Player) will choose a card from the deck which will give you a question depending on difficulty. The question will appear, and you must choose the best answer possible to move forward a certain number of spaces depending on your answer. But watch out for Loan Shark, don’t let him try and trick you into a scam. If so, you’ll move back a certain number of spaces. 

Controls:

Just need a mouse and click away!
